title: Idyllic Southern Sri Lanka Clifftop Weligama Escape near Galle Fort with Iconic Crescent-Shaped Pool
description:
Fall in love with the picturesque southern coast of Sri Lanka from this gorgeous five-star retreat, perched on the edge of soaring cliffs and overlooking the rolling waves of the Indian Ocean. A member of the prestigious Relais & Chateaux collection, this boutique haven boasts suites and villas with terracotta-tiled roofs, recreating a traditional Sri Lankan village.

Savour every inch of the ocean from the crescent-shaped infinity pool, at the Beach Club or from three elevated lookouts and indulge in restorative treatments in the comfort of your room or at the Sanctuary Spa. For the gourmands, culinary delight awaits with three restaurants, offering everything from traditional Sri Lankan curries to 'chef's table' style dining.
